document.full_text: kosuke fukudome hit a game-ending single as the chicago cubs scored twice in the ninth inning to beat the cincinnati reds 3-2 saturday.
document.title: fukudome's 9th-inning single gives cubs win over reds
lines_and_colors: kosuke fukudome hit a game-ending single as the chicago cubs scored twice in the ninth inning to beat the cincinnati reds 3-2 saturday.
